o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_Check_BusinessRuleHasAtLeastOneExample
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Creator: WesselsH1
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Comment: This should be on the level op mdde_BusinessRuleWithout mapping, but checks on that level are not visable in the modelcheck list.
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:HelpMessage: This check ensures that every business rule has at least one example
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:OutputMessage: The following business rules have no examples specified:
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:CheckScript:
Function %Check%(obj) %Check% = True
Dim colExamples : Set colExamples = obj.GetExtendedCollection("mdde_BusinessRule_Examples") If colExamples Is Nothing Then WriteError("BusinessRule '" & obj.DisplayName & "' has no examples collection!") %Check% = False ElseIf colExamples.Count = 0 Then WriteError("BusinessRule '" & obj.DisplayName & "' has no examples specified!") %Check% = False End If
End Function
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:AutoFixScrpt:
Function %Fix%(obj, outmsg) ' Implement your automatic correction on <obj> here ' filling <outmsg> as you wish ' and return True if successful.
outmsg = "Automatic correction not implemented"
%Fix% = False End Function
